A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By no accounts is it a \"bad movie.\" It was just a very safe movie. Nothing had consequences\, there were too many characters\, and any interesting plot points that were setup in the movie were thrown away in the third act.\nI really wanted to enjoy the movie\, and kept looking for something to grab onto\, but I could count the scenes I liked on one hand. The rest of the movie was fan service\, circle jerking\, and predictable.
